title: IInstanceToVaryOptions.ModifyD2SpacingValue
description: Modifies the spacing in Direction 2 of the specified pattern instance.
signature:
System.Boolean ModifyD2SpacingValue( 
   System.Int32
Instance
,
   System.Double
Value
)
returns: True if the spacing is modified successfully, false if not
remarks:
To calculate Instance:
Ensure that the D2PatternSeedOnly property in the pattern feature data object is set to false.
Calculate:
For a bi-directional pattern:
I
=
n2
* (
i
- 1) + (
j
- 1)
For a uni-directional pattern:
I
=
i
- 1
where:
I
= pattern instance number
n2
= number of instances in Direction 2
i
= index for Direction 1
j
= index for Direction 2
In the pattern's PropertyManager, find
n2
in the
Direction 2
> Spacing and Instances > Number of instances
field and find [
i,j
] in the
Modified Instances
section.
